item.title: Trump trade counselor Peter Navarro says planned tariffs won't spur inflation
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump has vowed to enact across-the-board tariffs, targeted import duties on China, Canada and Mexico, and tax cuts.

item.title: Trump files suit against Iowa pollster Ann Selzer and Des Moines Register newspaper
item.description: Selzer published a poll days before the election that said Kamala Harris was ahead. Trump ultimately won the state by 13 percentage points.

item.title: Germanyâ€™s auto giants were already reeling. Now Trump wants to turn them into American companies
item.description: For Germany, the prospect of U.S. tariffs on European autos comes at a time when it's top original equipment manufacturers are already reeling.

item.title: Databricks announces $10 billion financing at $62 billion valuation
item.description: The company's new valuation is up from $43 billion in 2023.

item.title: Dexcom's over-the-counter glucose monitor now offers users an AI summary of how sleep, meals and more impact sugar levels
item.description: Dexcom is bringing generative AI to Stelo users, starting with weekly personalized reports about their glucose
